story:
Hi and thanks for checking out our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign. 

If you drink Red Bull, Monster or any other energy product you've come to the right place. 

We are Nautilus Nutritional's - a nutritional start - up company.

We are proud to introuce our exciting new energy product - PowerShot!

PowerShot is an all natural energy powder that boosts energy instantly without the chemicals and the nasty after taste.


                  
If you drink 2 - 6 cups of coffe a day - you'll live PowerShot
If you drink 1 or more energy drinks a day - you'll love PowerShot
If you follow a sugar free diet - you'll love PowerShot
If youre a Vegan - you'll love PowerShot
If you're Diabetic - you'll love PowerShot
In fact PowerShot has been known to do the following:
  • Cure Hangovers
  • Help with Weightloss
  • Is Diabetic safe
  • Great for Vegetarians and Vegans
Finally the next generation of energy product has arrived - PowerShot!


                             

HOW DOES IT WORK?

PowerShot is a unique powder blend of:

Superfoods

Vitamins 

Natural caffeine 

PowerShot delivers an instant, long lasting energy boost anytime of night or day.

When you purchase our $10 perk on the right you get a 7 pack of PowerShot to try for a week!

PowerShot Energy Powder - Just pour into your mouth, your favorite drink or a smoothie and GO!

                                                     PowerShot is ... 

                          



                                  

About This Campaign

We are Nautilus Nutritional's.  A nutritional health food company with a passion for superfoods, organic products and energy. 

This crowdfunding campaign is to raise funds for the production, marketing  and distribution of PowerShot the all natural energy powder. 



                                                     PowerShot: The Facts

                    

                                                  PowerShot contains:

                                               · Caffeine from Guarana

                                · Coconut water and potassium for hydration

                             · Acai & Pomegranate for improved circulation



      PowerShot is precisely measured in each stick pack to deliver the exact 

                  amount of each ingredient providing a natural healthy boost .


                    


               

For just $10 you will receive a 1 week supply of PowerShot along with an Energizing 7 - day food and fitness plan - Go on Give it a try!

The Team

We are a close knit team here of socially conscious business people who really want to see a healthy change in the world.

Lead by Greg Gomez, and his awesome Boston Terrier Bella, the team at Nautilus Nutritional's are in safe hands.


                 

Greg - Founder                                              Bella - Spokesdog

                          

Greg has over 30 years experience in building and developing businesses and has worked in the data and finance industries for many  years. 

Two years ago Greg made the decision to follow his curiosity about nutrition and explore the powerful benefits of healing and restoration of superfoods on the body. 

He also recognized that many of the energy products available on the shelves for consumers didn't seem to have evolved and so he decided to explore the most effective and healthy way to energize the body and came up with the first in a line of 8 products for Nautilus Nutritional's - PowerShot.

Greg's research investigations lead to the development of Nautilus Nutritional's, a socially conscious nutrition company that is 'thriven' thriving and driven. 

                

Nautilus4life.com the company website is a source of information on energizing naturally, with articles and reports on the benefits of superfoods and the truth behind using natural energy boosting ingredients as opposed to the products on the shelves in most supermarkets. 

              

At Nautilus Nutritional's, our cause of choice is Diabetes. The onslaught and increase in Diabetes across the US is cause for concern for many, and with Greg experiencing first hand the devastating benefits of the conditionon a close family member, Diabetes is a huge motivator in delivering a range of products suitable for Diabetics along with anyone else who needs an energy boost. The company  share a percentage of profits with children's Diabetes charities that help with diagnostics and treatments of type 1 and 2 Diabetes. 

Whether you are a supporter of Diabetes charities and organisations or...
  • a  clean eater 
  • a Vegan
  • a tired and busy mom
  • a party animal
  • a Gamer 
  • a busy professional
...... please support our campaign ...


          By supporting this campaign you will help us to do the following:

                    

We want to increase our marketing and distribution so we can get PowerShot to as many people as possible.

                   

We need $20,000 to finalise the production of PowerShot, and continue with our product development improving and expanding our range.

Of course in the meantime you can purchase a perk right here on Indiegogo and pre-order your pack of PowerShot for a 1 week supply or even a 6 month supply - all at a super discounted price.

      

     

      



  


                                   

     

How You Can Help

PowerShot is ready to launch. The figures have been crunched, the blend has been perfected and we are ready for business.

We simply need your help, your support and your contributions to get PowerShot to market now!

We decided to launch a Crowdfunding campaign because we know it’s a great way to reach out to people who are seeking a healthy alternative to energy drinks, poor nutrition or general lack of energy.

We know that through Crowdfunding everyone can give a little in order for us to reach our goal, and we can give something amazing in return to each and everyone of you.

We also know that if we can tell enough people about PowerShot through Crowdfunding we will be set to move forward and launch some of our other products, which are just as great.

So join the energy revolution and purchase your first box of PowerShot, and you can help us in the process to meet our goal.

Check out our supporter’s rewards to the right to pre-order your PowerShot 

Thanks for stopping by and checking out the campaign.
For further information on the campaign or updates on your perks please contact Greg at: greg@nautilus4life

story:
"Let's go invent tomorrow instead of worrying about what happened yesterday"

What is Fikra Space?

Fikra Space is a tech community founded in Baghdad in 2012. We bring Iraqi technology enthusiasts together in an environment that encourages them to share their ideas and work together to pursue them. Our goal is to promote entrepreneurship and help young people create a better future for themselves.


That sounds nice, but what do you actually do?

Fikra Space provides budding Iraqi entrepreneurs access to a co-working space, mentorship and training at no charge. Our doors are open to anyone who wants to start a business or grow an existing one, share his / her knowledge or learn from the community. Fikra Space has accumulated a community of 19,000+ engaged and active members. We have organised more than 200 events that have been attended by more than 10,000 attendees.

We organised the first ever start-up weekends in Baghdad and Basrah to plant the seeds for the Iraqi ecosystem of tech entrepreneurs. We followed up with weekly events that focused on knowledge sharing and capacity building to grow and nurture the ecosystem. Some of these events were technical workshops in C++, Java, Android and Arduino and where we tested new and disruptive products such as Arduino microcontrollers, Rasperry Pi and 3D printers. We also helped entrepreneurs market and sell their ideas through photography courses and market strategy sessions. Our work is all non-profit, our members are all volunteers.



That’s great, but any success so far?

Fikra Space has helped Iraqi entrepreneurs launch successful start-ups used by thousands of people in Iraq and abroad. We helped them with anything from design and development to sales and marketing. 



The government has recognised our work and asked us to help draft a regulatory framework for technology incubators in Iraq. We are just in the beginning, but we are making progress in building Iraq’s technology sector from scratch.

That’s impressive, but what's the bigger purpose?

Iraq is a country of many contrasts. Its biggest opportunities are often its biggest challenges:

  • Rich Iraq, poor Iraq?
    Iraq is one of the richest countries in the world with abundant natural resources
    More than 20% (6.2 MM people) of the population lives below the poverty line 
  • The cradle of civilisation back to the Stone Age? 
    The first written alphabet was invented in Mesopotamia, modern day Iraq
    More than 20% (4.2 MM people) of Iraq’s adult population is illiterate

  • Young but idle?
    Iraq is one of the most youthful nations in the world
    Youth unemployment in Iraq is among the highest in the region at 34%

Youth unemployment and economic hardship are directly linked to the wave of extremism that has swept Iraq since 2014. Young people who lack jobs and who face widespread corruption on a daily basis may see few options available to them other than joining extremist groups to earn a living. This is particularly true for Iraq where ISIS recruits are typically between the ages of 16 and 25 and can reportedly earn up to US$1,000 per month.

Our purpose is to empower our young community by creating opportunities and rewarding entrepreneurship. As a free-of-charge, open-for-all institution, we offer a fresh contrast to many of Iraq’s public and private institutions that are often plagued by corruption. We want to cultivate a culture of mentorship, hard work, teamwork and success among our members. We hope to spread this culture to the entire youth population through our success stories, the likes of S Convert, Journal, Mu3amala and d3. Ultimately, we believe that empowering youth is the way forward for a peaceful and prosperous Iraq.


You guys rock, but why do you need my help?

We have created a great platform for entrepreneurship with very limited means. For example, we have organised more than 200 events without actually having a permanent place. Instead, we have had to rely on NGOs to lend us their places post work hours to hold our events. Also, we have helped entrepreneurs develop prototypes and businesses without owning any technical equipment. Instead, our core members have brought their own from home to share with the community. On top of that, we have mentored and trained entrepreneurs without having any full-time employees, mentors or trainers. Instead, our core members are volunteers that take on such positions in tandem with having full-time jobs elsewhere.

We are very proud to have achieved great results with limited means. But our community is growing rapidly, and it needs attention on a continuous basis to mature. To give them more attention, we need to grow with them. And for that, we need your support.


Trust me I want to help, but isn't supporting the technology sector in Iraq a little premature?

Iraq represents a great opportunity for early movers and pioneers. The country is embracing technology at a rapid pace driven by a young, entrepreneurial and resilient population, continuous development and openness, and a strong consumption coupled with a lack of basic services.

  • Young, entrepreneurial and resilient population
    52% of Iraq’s population is below 19 years
    34% of the workforce is comprised of self-employed entrepreneurs
    Iraqis remain united and defiant in the face of violence and extremism
  • Continuous development and openness
    Internet penetration nearly doubled in 2014
    IQ Networks is investing US$100 MM in a broadband cable throughout Iraq
    Iraq is the only real democracy in the Middle East
  • Strong consumption and a lack of basic services
    Household consumption is 65% of GDP
    Private sector must expand as economy transitions to free economy
    Country needs to “catch up” with world after decades of wars and sanctions

Perspective is key, and we feel that it is absent in the outside world’s view of Iraq. Usually the bad news gets out and the good news doesn't. Little coverage is given to success stories from Iraq. Success stories such as the mobile sector for example. In 2003, mobile penetration in Iraq was 0%. In 2013, it was nearly 100%. The country recently rolled out 3G services. But even prior to that, smartphone penetration was at 30%. People want change, and they adapt to it rapidly.

A similar success story is in the making. Internet penetration stands at a low 25% but is growing rapidly. According to the GSMA commission, it is estimated that, with access to suitable radio spectrum and fibre infrastructure, the number of mobile broadband connections in Iraq could reach more than 30 MM by 2025 (i.e. 85% penetration). This growth has the potential to stimulate profound economic value in Iraq over the next decade, including an additional US$102 BN in GDP, 270,000 new businesses and an additional 530,000 full-time jobs.



It sounds promising, but there must be huge challenges?

Iraq is not an easy country for doing business; the environment is particularly tough on entrepreneurs. Instability, corruption and lack of funding are the three major challenges making an entrepreneur’s life difficult. But as the saying goes, when the going gets tough, the tough gets going. We are resilient and we are problem solvers:

  • Instability Iraqi entrepreneur Ammar Ameen launched Iraq’s first ecommerce platform Miswag.net in April 2014. Its success was imminent as hundreds of people placed orders in May. Then ISIS swept through northern and western Iraq in June. Social media was subsequently blocked for a couple of months, shutting Ammar’s most important marketing channel. So what did Ammar do? He used the downtime to improve the platform, analysing data he gathered from customers and made sure to come back with a better product. In April 2015, Ammar relaunched with another big, successful campaign.

  • Corruption 

    Iraq is ranked 156 out of 189 countries in the World Bank’s Ease of Doing Business Index. Government processes in Iraq are long and tiresome, and prone to corruption and bribery. Up to 40% of start-ups operate without going through the formal registration process, primarily to circumvent bureaucracy and corruption. As a result, it is difficult for start-ups to do business and take off. So how do we solve it? Fikra Space has launched Mu3amala, a crowdsourcing platform that lists all the documents, steps and costs required for every government process. Mu3amala

    promotes transparency and lets citizens directly call out corruption. 

  • Lack of funding The Iraqi economy is dominated by the public sector. The private sector is mainly comprised of contractors that provide services to the government. Tech entrepreneurs are not on the priority list and finding funding for a tech start-up is a rarity. So how do we do it? Fikra Space approaches investors on behalf of entrepreneurs, allowing them to focus on running their business. We recently helped start-up d3 secure funding from an Iraqi investor. But most importantly, we have learned how to operate a lean start-up, to be fruitful and minimise costs and maximise revenues from the outset. 


More About Us

Why are you called Fikra Space?


Our tokens of gratitude

As a token of gratitude for your generous donation, we want to send you some souvenirs. These serve both to remind you of us and to remind us of you.



There are more details on our tokens of gratitude on the right-hand side panel.

Our great people

Our people are young, fun, smart, ambitious and eager to learn. This video is shot in a place that was provided to us by a politician running for parliament. Unfortunately, she was not allowed to host in this place after her campaign. 



Our media coverage

  • CNN: Can Iraq's Geeks Save the country?
  • Huffington Post: Another Voice: Entrepreneurship in Baghdad
  • Wamda: 8 Hackerspaces Changing the Arab World
  • International Policy Digest: 10 Middle Eastern Startups to Watch in 2015
  • Safecast: Safecasting Iraq: Open Data to Open Doors
  • littleBits: Fikra Space Shares littleBits in Iraq
  • Aljazeera: Iraqi Youth on the Rise
  • Awat: Fikra Space
  • GEMSI: Baghdad Hackerspace’s DIY Prosthetic Socket Project
  • Tadween Publishing: Iraq’s Hackerspace
  • Talent Youth: Startup...Baghdad

Other Questions

How dangerous is Baghdad?

Baghdad is obviously not as safe as your average city. Although they have decreased significantly lately, car bombs continue to terrorise the city’s population now and then. In the meantime, people go on about their daily lives as usual. This report by Frontline gives a balanced view of life in Baghdad. 


As mentioned above, perspective is always key. The bad news is always at the forefront when it comes to Baghdad. Did you know for example that fewer people died from violence related (including terrorism) crimes in Baghdad than in any of Cape Town, Detroit and New Orleans in 2013? It is worth reiterating that perspective is key.

So can I come to Baghdad?

Absolutely, we would love to show you what the famous Iraqi hospitality is all about. If you are interested in visiting Baghdad, please let us know at fikraspace@gmail.com and we can help with the details.


How else can I help?

We want to accelerate Iraqi entrepreneurship by offering entrepreneurs access to a co-working space, one-on-one mentorship and professional training. Here are some other ways you could contribute:

  • Mentorship Entrepreneurs in Iraq are ambitious but they need a lot of guidance. We plan to offer them one-on-one mentorship to make sure that they get a consistent loop of feedback on their ideas and businesses from people that have been in their shoes before. If you qualify, you could join us a mentor. You could come to Baghdad or mentor our entrepreneurs over the web.
  • Training Our entrepreneurs are eager to learn and we plan to offer them regular training sessions to satisfy their thirst for knowledge. But also to get them up to speed on technology trends around the world. If you qualify, you could join us as a trainer. You could hold training sessions if you come to Baghdad or we could organise them as web conferences.
  • Tools / equipment Operating for the last three years in Iraq with no funding has taught us how to hustle. For example, we do not own any equipment but rely on our core members to bring them to our events and share them with the community. If you have any equipment (e.g. 3D printers, printers, computers, HDTVs etc.) that you want to get rid of but is still functional we would love to take them.

If you wish to make a difference, please let us know at fikraspace@gmail.com.

Ok, I think I’ve read enough…

Ok, but before you go, please share our campaign. Help us grow our movement by spreading the word, telling your friends and colleagues and the world about how they can help Iraq's geeks save their country (share our campaign #HelpIraqiGeeksSaveTheirCountry). When you met our people in the video above, they had one simple request: comment, like, subscribe, share! Please don't let them down :)
story_txt:
"Let's go invent tomorrow instead of worrying about what happened yesterday"What
is Fikra Space?Fikra
Space is a tech community founded in Baghdad in 2012. We bring Iraqi technology
enthusiasts together in an environment that encourages them to share their
ideas and work together to pursue them. Our goal is to promote entrepreneurship
and help young people create a better future for themselves.That sounds nice, but what do you actually do?
Fikra
Space provides budding Iraqi entrepreneurs access to a co-working space,
mentorship and training at no charge. Our doors are open to anyone who wants to
start a business or grow an existing one, share his / her knowledge or learn
from the community. Fikra Space has accumulated a community of 19,000+ engaged
and active members. We have organised more than 200 events that have been
attended by more than 10,000 attendees. 
We
organised the first ever start-up weekends in Baghdad and Basrah to plant the
seeds for the Iraqi ecosystem of tech entrepreneurs. We followed up with weekly
events that focused on knowledge sharing and capacity building to grow and
nurture the ecosystem. Some of these events were technical workshops in C++,
Java, Android and Arduino and where we tested new and disruptive products such
as Arduino microcontrollers, Rasperry Pi and 3D printers. We also helped
entrepreneurs market and sell their ideas through photography courses and
market strategy sessions. Our work is all non-profit, our members are all
volunteers.That’s
great, but any success so far?Fikra
Space has helped Iraqi entrepreneurs launch successful start-ups used by
thousands of people in Iraq and abroad. We helped them with anything from
design and development to sales and marketing. The
government has recognised our work and asked us to help draft a regulatory
framework for technology incubators in Iraq. We are just in the beginning, but
we are making progress in building Iraq’s technology sector from scratch.That’s
impressive, but what's the bigger purpose?
Iraq
is a country of many contrasts. Its biggest opportunities are often its biggest
challenges:
Rich Iraq, poor Iraq? Iraq is one of the richest countries in the world with abundant natural resourcesMore than 20% (6.2 MM people) of the population lives below the poverty line 

The
cradle of civilisation back to the Stone Age? The first written alphabet was invented in Mesopotamia, modern day IraqMore than 20% (4.2 MM people) of Iraq’s adult population is illiterate

Young but idle?Iraq is one of the most youthful nations in the worldYouth unemployment in Iraq is among the highest in the region at 34%
Youth
unemployment and economic hardship are directly linked to the wave of extremism
that has swept Iraq since 2014. Young people who lack jobs and who face
widespread corruption on a daily basis may see few options available to them
other than joining extremist groups to earn a living. This is particularly true
for Iraq where ISIS recruits are typically between the ages of 16 and 25 and
can reportedly earn up to US$1,000 per month. 
Our
purpose is to empower our young community by creating opportunities and
rewarding entrepreneurship. As a free-of-charge, open-for-all institution, we
offer a fresh contrast to many of Iraq’s public and private institutions that
are often plagued by corruption. We want to cultivate a culture of mentorship,
hard work, teamwork and success among our members. We hope to spread this
culture to the entire youth population through our success stories, the likes
of S Convert, Journal, Mu3amala and d3. Ultimately, we believe that empowering
youth is the way forward for a peaceful and prosperous Iraq.

You
guys rock, but why do you need my help?
We
have created a great platform for entrepreneurship with very limited means. For
example, we have organised more than 200 events without actually having a
permanent place. Instead, we have had to rely on NGOs to lend us their places post
work hours to hold our events. Also, we have helped entrepreneurs develop
prototypes and businesses without owning any technical equipment. Instead, our
core members have brought their own from home to share with the community.
On top of that, we have mentored and trained entrepreneurs without having any full-time employees, mentors or trainers. Instead,
our core members are volunteers that take on such positions in tandem with
having full-time jobs elsewhere.
We are
very proud to have achieved great results with limited means. But our community
is growing rapidly, and it needs attention on a continuous basis to mature. To give
them more attention, we need to grow with them. And for that, we need your
support.
Trust me I want to help, but isn't supporting the technology sector in Iraq a little premature?Iraq represents a great opportunity for early movers and pioneers. The country is embracing technology at a rapid pace driven by a young, entrepreneurial and resilient population, continuous development and openness, and a strong consumption coupled with a lack of basic services.
Young, entrepreneurial and resilient population52% of Iraq’s population is below 19 years34% of the workforce is comprised of self-employed entrepreneursIraqis remain united and defiant in the face of violence and extremism
Continuous development and opennessInternet penetration nearly doubled in 2014IQ Networks is investing US$100 MM in a broadband cable throughout IraqIraq is the only real democracy in the Middle East
Strong consumption and a lack of basic servicesHousehold consumption is 65% of GDPPrivate sector must expand as economy transitions to free economyCountry needs to “catch up” with world after decades of wars and sanctions
Perspective
is key, and we feel that it is absent in the outside world’s view of Iraq. Usually
the bad news gets out and the good news doesn't. Little coverage is given to
success stories from Iraq. Success stories such as the mobile sector for
example. In 2003, mobile penetration in Iraq was 0%. In 2013, it was nearly
100%. The country recently rolled out 3G services. But even prior to that,
smartphone penetration was at 30%. People want change, and they adapt to it
rapidly.
A
similar success story is in the making. Internet penetration stands at a low 25%
but is growing rapidly. According to the GSMA commission, it is estimated that,
with access to suitable radio spectrum and fibre infrastructure, the number of
mobile broadband connections in Iraq could reach more than 30 MM by 2025 (i.e.
85% penetration). This growth has the potential to stimulate profound economic
value in Iraq over the next decade, including an additional US$102 BN in GDP,
270,000 new businesses and an additional 530,000 full-time jobs.


It sounds
promising, but there must be huge challenges?
Iraq

the formal registration process, primarily to circumvent bureaucracy and
corruption. As a result, it is difficult for start-ups to do business and take

platform that lists all the documents, steps and costs required for every government process. Mu3amala 
promotes transparency and lets citizens directly call out corruption.

story:
Looking for a place to release your creative spirit? Only finding limits, barriers and web platforms that are time consuming and frustrating? Turn to Somidax and let your creative genius soar!

Somidax is the only entertainment based web platform that caters to our users’ needs. Whether you are a beginner or if you are more advanced in your field, Somidax has something for you.



Somidax: Where Creativity Comes To Life!

If you have been looking for a place where like-minded creative professionals come together to showcase their talents, share ideas and express their creativity, stop looking and join Somidax today.

Serving the global web community, Somidax was founded under the principle of offering our users a creative stepping off platform where they can be free to express themselves and show off their self-creativity to a global audience. We are more than just an entertainment site, we are an online community of creative-minded web users who know what they want and have finally found it with us.

Our Philosophy

Our team of experienced professionals strive to provide a higher level of service and support that our users can’t get anywhere else in an effort to drive customer reliability and satisfaction. To us, the users are the most important aspect of our site; we want to give them an easy to use online experience where they can find exactly what they are looking for without all of the hassles of those other “entertainment” websites.

Why Somidax ?

Without change there is no innovation, creativity, or incentive for improvement. Those who initiate change will have a better opportunity to manage the change that is inevitable. Somidax is bringing about that change to the online entertainment world by offering our exclusive web platform that can be used by anyone in the world at any time. Our goal is to bring creativity and entertainment together in an easy to use online platform where you can come to relax, unwind from a hard day or to show off your talents.


Connect With Somidax Today!

Somidax is the place where creative minds can be free to express themselves, nurture their talents and see them grow. We are a community of like-minded artists sharing, expressing and creating. When you join Somidax, you will be making a difference not only in your life, but in the lives of others all around the world. Express yourself today with Somidax and let the world see what you have to offer. Be part of our creative community now!

Like us on Facebook to stay updated on the latest news and events from Somidax, or to learn more about Somidax and how our innovative online platform can help you, contact us via email at: (your info email here) and let one of our friendly, knowledgeable representatives assist you and answer any questions you might have.

BRINGING CREATIVITY TO BE ENJOYED!!!

“Creativity is putting your imagination to work, and it's produced the most extraordinary results in human culture.” Ken Robinson


Where Do the Funds Go ?

  • Optimize our web platform
  • Fund new animation production
  • Fund new movie production
  • Expand our market area for new income stream
  • Cover overhead expenditure

story:
I first became introduced to work with widows when I visited ‘Ma-Dham’, a home for 75 widows that is run by an NGO, Guild for Service, in the holy village of Vrindavan.  Unfortunately, Indian widows are often shunned from society and turned out by both their family and their in-laws; they are not allowed to participate in large community events and have become their own insular community.


I sought to positively impact the lives of widows and to create a self-sustaining cycle of change. After observing the vocational training classes for the widows at the home, which consist of learning how to sew or to make dried snacks, I realized that these skills could be applied in a more meaningful way than selling the goods to fund Ma-Dham’s activities. I recalled that the Guild for Service also holds a mass marriage ceremony twice a year in which 30-40 couples are married simultaneously, to discourage the discriminatory dowry tradition. In India dowry (or 'Dahej') is the durable goods, cash, and real or movable property that is  given by the bride's family to the bridegroom, his parents, or his relatives as a condition of the marriage. The NGO gives jewelry, clothes and household items to each couple and finances the cost of the marriage. I decided to link up these two important areas of work and encourage the widows at ‘Ma-Dham’ to embroider ‘sarees’ , a traditional indian dress worn by the bride, that benefactors could finance and donate to the brides at the mass marriages. 


This idea started a cycle that is beneficial for both the widows at Vrindavan as well as the brides to be. I named this initiative ‘The Red Saree Movement’ as a nod to the societal rule that widows must differentiate themselves from the rest of the population by abstaining from colorful clothes and only wearing while. The goal of this initiative is to create a circle that involves the benefactors who finance the cloth for the sarees ,cloth bags and other items, the widows of Vrindavan who make these items and use the excess donations to financially empower themselves, and the brides-to-be, who receive a free sari and are thus better able to escape the pressures of dowry. To encourage people to get involved with this cycle and to help break the stigmas against widows, I created a documentary on the ‘The Red Saree Movement’ with the intention of raising awareness and increasing funds.

story:
Why do we build THE FLOAD™?

We build THE FLOAD™ because we believe that this unbearable situation must be and can be resolved:

Some Facts:

As we speak new kind of jobs are appearing by the day. And old jobs are falling into oblivion fast. One cannot predict what’s going to happen next. Neither employers, nor job seekers have more than just little control of that, if any. Because today's and tomorrow's challenges can’t be solved using yesterday's methods. The cost this has to society is unfathomable. The impact it has on you is next to unbearable.

Your talent is desperately needed. And now. But first it must be found. And once found it must be matched with this one type of job that is right for you. Time is of the essence. Precision in matching jobs with talents is crucial. Eliminating biases in the process is indispensable to achieve reliable results.

Our Endeavour:

This is our first step to bring our endeavour to life. Our endeavour dedicated to you. We are building the ultimate online talent platform.

We believe technology should be used to solve real world problems. Not just wasting it by creating yet another app that sells your data to advertisers and else.

We believe that job / talent search must be done by an intelligent system that matches the right job with the right person. Automatically. In real time. Thus eliminating the hassle. Once and forever.

Hence, that’s why we create THE FLOAD™. We asked ourselves “why improving something by say 2% if it can be 100 times better?”. A hiring system that is fundamentally flawed shuts the doors to opportunity. For job seekers and employers alike. There is no reason to continue riding a dead horse.

This is a new recruitment era - this is your time!

Privacy and Data Security

Your privacy rights and the security of your data are of the utmost importance to us. Because personal data is sensitive and must be protected. Therefore all your data on our servers is encrypted. You are in control what you share. At all times. You own your data.

Because you are our clients and not our product. Unlike many others we do not make money by selling your data to anybody. We do not make money with targeted advertising. Period.

We  can provide that because THE FLOAD™ is a ‘members only’ based community at a fee for membership.

Why would you settle for less?

Why we need your help

This is for you. The young and hopeful jobseeker eager to work the first time. And it is also for you, the experienced but disillusioned worker. You are in the quest to find a job, because you need to make ends meet. For yourself and also for your families.

It’s a never ending story, because the times they are changing. Already right now 75% of the working population worldwide have only short term temporary employment, are contractors, or have no contract at all (according to the UN / ILO). The results are uncertainty and also an increasing payment gap between the fewer employments with unlimited contracts and the temporary employments.

At the same time employers are having problems to find the best talents for their jobs. And enough of those. As a consequence employers miss the mark in 82% of their hiring decisions.

The traditional job search and hiring system can’t work in today’s and tomorrow’s environments, because it’s fundamentally flawed.

That’s how THE FLOAD™ was born. We, the people behind THE FLOAD™, developed since quite some time the idea for THE FLOAD™. We did that because we know from our personal experience how job search feels and how much the hiring process sucks. For both, employees and employers.

We envisioned a system that rules out the personal bias as much as possible. A system that zeros in on data. A system able to find the talents of each one of you and makes it count. Producing the right match of talent and job. Automatically. In real time. A system taking care of the job seeker and the employer alike and eliminating the hassle.

Lots of research and lots of interviews later we had the missing parts of the puzzle we needed to create THE FLOAD™.

To build it and make it work we need you. We need your help, because only with you THE FLOAD™ can be brought to life. You are in charge to decide whether this is something you would love to have.

The question you should ask yourself is:

“How much am I willing to commit my life to that endeavour?”

Our endeavour of changing the way hiring is done. Our endeavour to revolutionize the way jobs are matched with the right talents.

One thing is certain: When you continue doing what you always did, you continue getting what you always got.

Thank you sincerely for considering us. Please make a donation.

The Team of

THE FLOAD™

Use of Funds

Building the company’s foundation

Kicking off the basics and getting ready to rock'n'roll:

With the first $ 10,000 we will cover some basics. Basics like securing workspace, some legal and patent fees, and other administrative details. It also will help us to get our founding members program ready.

As you can imagine our vision goes way beyond that. To build the foundation of THE FLOAD™ and to hire and expand our team we need your help.

Here are our next goals:

Our Team

Related Links

THE FLOAD™ - Google plus Collection

THE FLOAD™ - Google plus Page

Frequently Asked Questions

What is THE FLOAD™?

THE FLOAD™ is an online talent platform that uses technology to match the right job with right candidate. In real time. Automatically.

How do I get on THE FLOAD™?

You become a founding member and be among the first to get on.

How much is the THE FLOAD™?

Our plan is to offer the service for job seekers for $ 78 / year. That’s just one large cup of caffe latte per month or $ 6.50. However, when you become a founding member that fee is only $ 48 / year for as long as you remain being a member.

What is a Founding Member?

We will offer a ‘Founding Member Program’ for job seekers. Founding Members are those who sign up during a limited pre-order period. Founding Members receive special privileges and can participate in the pre-order referral program.

What Features does the Founding Membership include?

  • one-year prepaid subscription to THE FLOAD™ at $ 48

  • all future premium functions are included

  • subscription begins when beta testing is complete

  • Jobseekers lifetime subscription rate of $ 4.00 / month ($ 48 / year) as long as you remain being a member

  • Participation in the pre-order referral program

How many Founding Members are you allowing in?

At the moment we are in the process of creating the program. The final limit has not yet been set. However, you might want to become a Founding Member a soon as the program is announced and live.

Can I beta test without being a Founding Member?

No. Only Founding Members can beta test.

Can employers also become Founding Members?

Yes. However, for employers we have a separate program. If you are an employer and are interested in becoming a Founding Member, please don’t hesitate and contact us at welcomethefload@gmail.com.

Can employers become sponsors of THE FLOAD™?

We do entertain a limited number of sponsorships. If you are an employer and interested of becoming a sponsor please contact us at welcomethefload@gmail.com.

How can I reach THE FLOAD™ team?

You can contact us any time at welcomethefload@gmail.com.

Does THE FLOAD™ have a webpage?

Here is our landing page: thefload.com

What about THE FLOAD™ privacy?

Your privacy rights and the security of your data are of the utmost importance to us. Because personal data is sensitive and must be protected. Therefore all your data on our servers is encrypted. You are in control what you share. At all times. You own your data.

Because you are our clients and not our product. Unlike many others we do not make money by selling your data to anybody. We do not make money with targeted advertising. Period.

THE FLOAD™ comprehensive approach to Trust & Safety includes technology safeguards, our in-house team, and our global community all working together to keep our platform safe.

How do I get THE FLOAD™ news?

We will keep you updated on any news and progress and are happy to get in touch with you. Please leave your email address.

When do I get my THE FLOAD™ perks?

You will be on top of list for our ‘Founding Member Program’. You don’t have to pay anything right now. Once the program is online you will be the first ones contacted. Also, we will keep you up to date on a regular basis.

Where are you located?

We are based in Germany (Rhein-Main Area) and in the US (Silicon Valley).

How else can I help?

If you could spread the word and share our campaign with as many people as possible that would be simply fantastic.

Still can't find what you search for?

Contact support: welcomethefload@gmail.com
story_txt:
Why do we build THE FLOAD™? We build THE FLOAD™ because we believe that this unbearable situation must be and can be resolved:

Some Facts:


As we speak new kind of jobs are appearing by the day. And old jobs are falling into oblivion fast. One cannot predict what’s going to happen next. Neither employers, nor job seekers have more than just little control of that, if any. Because today's and tomorrow's challenges can’t be solved using yesterday's methods. The cost this has to society is unfathomable. The impact it has on you is next to unbearable. Your talent is desperately needed. And now. But first it must be found. And once found it must be matched with this one type of job that is right for you. Time is of the essence. Precision in matching jobs with talents is crucial. Eliminating biases in the process is indispensable to achieve reliable results.Our Endeavour:
This is our first step to bring our endeavour to life. Our endeavour dedicated to you. We are building the ultimate online talent platform.
We believe technology should be used to solve real world problems. Not just wasting it by creating yet another app that sells your data to advertisers and else.We believe that job / talent search must be done by an intelligent system that matches the right job with the right person. Automatically. In real time. Thus eliminating the hassle. Once and forever.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Franco Garcia and I am creator of the Eventago app.  I grew up in a military family and spent most of my childhood traveling around the world.  I followed my football dreams as far as I could before returning back to my home in San Diego, California.  In 2006, I enlisted in the service like my father and brother before me, and served eight years as a sailor in the United States Navy.  As I traveled the world alone,  I began to understand the importance of the connections we make an every day.  I was honorably discharged from the Navy in 2015.

During my years in college and the military, I loved to go out and be around the people.  San Diego is known for great beach parties down by Pacific Beach and exciting nights down in the Gaslamp District.  I believed the saying that "music is the universal language".  In fact, while stationed overseas in Italy, a local lounge bar asked if I would play music, or DJ, at their bar to promote more customers who enjoyed music from stateside.  From there I began to develop an idea to make it easy to find venues that played the type of music you wanted to listen to.

The Concept

The original concept of the app also provided a way to help DJ's (Disc Jockey's) find work wherever they were in the world.  I called the project, "KnXM Worldwide", a play on the words "Connects 'em Worldwide".  So, I spent a majority of 2014 doing research on all the apps for DJ's and music events.  What I found were apps that either costed a fortune for a subscription or only supported already famous artists.  

As I continued to review these apps, I began seeing and meeting artists around the area at the local scenes in Italy.  I was surprised to see that many of these artists were co-workers, parents, and people from the local area.  The best part was that we shared a common love of music and dancing.  On top of that, there was talent everywhere from singers to photographers to DJ's and dancers.  And though all of the people came from different backgrounds and cultures, we found a common bond not just in music, but through events and making friendships.  

The Impact

I immediately changed the business concept and thought about making a app that shared every artist and business in the every community.  The app would promote and encourage events that people might be interested in and maybe did not know about.   All with the aim of promoting community reinvestment through social interaction and events.   

The app would provide a contemporary means of promoting yourself as:

  •  ARTISTS searching for work or who wants to share their talents with their community.  
  •  BUSINESSES who are looking for ways to promote without wasting time and money with traditional methods of marketing.
and the most important function of the app is for the 
  • USERS who have control the way they socialize.  The app creates a filter for the user's social choices,  and is a great way to become familiar with your community and events happening in your city.  From the night life clubs to a neighborhood block party, Eventago is a all-in-one app that promotes, builds, and shares.

Understand: the important part about living in the age of social media is to not forget to actually socially interact with each other.  To be afraid of rejection.  To find true love.  To share a moment with new and old friends.  To sing a song together.  To capture first moments.  And most of all, to be together as a people.  

What We Need & What You Get

I invested over $57,000 dollars of my own money to start this project in 2014.  I am proud to announce the release of the Apple version will be in June 2015!  

As I put the product out on social network, I accepted the fact that making an ANDROID version of the app is a must.  So, I decided to reach out on Indiegogo to seek help on getting started with the Android version.  

Funds will be directly invested with the engineers and technicians at CLEEVIO s.r.o., the company who built the amazing Apple version of Eventago.  You can check out some of their wonderful products at www.cleevio.com.

Milestones of Payments

Payments for the Android version (using amounts from the Apple version as reference):
  • 30% - at signature: $12810
  • 20% - at the end of the coding and implementation of created graphics: $8540
  • 30% - at the end of programming and development phase: $12810
  • 20% - at the final delivery of the app and Q&A period: $8540
Other expenses to include:
  • Building a Eventago Webpage w/ commercial: $10000 
  • Copyrights and Trademarks: $500 - $2000 (depending on international class fees)
  • Annual accounting fees with 1800accountant: $3000
  • Promotional Products (T-shirts, logos, etc.): $3000

Risks & Challenges

As much as I want to change the world, I know that I am only one man with a vision. I believe this app has the potential to rebuild the connections we have as people.  My vision statement consists of simple ideas.

  • Put people back in control of their business, artistry, and lifestyle.
  • Connect people back to their community.
For every parent who raises a family, works, and has their own business -
For every artist that has a gift in song, words, and picture -
For every community spreading cultural awareness and positivity -
and for anyone who feels they are alone in this world-
This app was built for you.
I am one man who wants to build back a sense of belonging and interaction with the people.  This is my way of giving back to the communities around the world who took me in as their own.  I will continue to fight for the people to get to know each other, one neighbor at a time.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help: I would like you to share your favorite community events on the app.  From your favorite hang out to the locally owned "Mom & Pop" stores, please share your neighborhood with all of us.  You never know the connections you can make by just sharing your community.

I would encourage you to download the app and build events that encourage positive social interaction.  The best part is, the USER can download the app for free and can build five events from a local garage sale to kid friendly events.  

And lastly, remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for all the love and support!

Please visit www.eventagoapp.com to see the mobile landing page for the app!

story:
How did I get here?

Well...it's a funny story. In 2012 I fell and broke the heck out of my foot while at a modeling shoot , & it literally turned my world upside down. As a way to keep myself occupied/not as stir crazy while I was in a cast up to my knee & terrible at using crutches I started painting antique/vintage furniture, & called it 'Ginger Made That'. Well that's somehow ended up with me here today making a dream that I didn't even know I had 3 years ago into an actual physical thing. (Hey, this is me here, have I ever done things in the 'correct' order/line of progression? No, I haven't.)

I'd been in a small shop of my own for a year now, but it was time to grow, so I moved to a larger space. Specifically a space in a 100 year old building that needed a TON of work. I've been working 10+ hour days doing everything from fixing & painting walls to pulling down old (and seriously gross) drop ceilings to fixing awful wiring to finishing drywall & yeah...it's been a hell of a lot of work. 

If I've been working my ass off why the hell am I here? Well...here's why. It's a 100 year old building & some of the things that have been done to it in the past have been...questionable. Namely the floors & ceilings. No really, look what happened when the carpet in part of the shop space was taken up...concrete came up along with it.


See the black parts? That's where the concrete came up with the carpet and left big uneven holes all over the place. It's a problem, because I can't put down flooring until this hot mess is fixed. My budget kinda didn't call for having to do such extensive work on the flooring, so here I am, asking for y'all to help a girl out a bit.

But What If?

What will happen if I don't hit my 'goal'? Well...there's the risk that I may fret 24/7 about everything & doubt whether or not I can actually make this happen. (Thanks, anxiety!) 

(For those of you that don't 'know' me, I am literally the most dedicated person on the planet. A survivor. If I can survive all that I have and still stand up to 'try' things, I can do just about anything.)

The Impact?

Honestly? I'm just a random girl from Nashville that found something she loves to do while chronicling it all on the internet...but I've got 'heart', as they call it. There's nothing else in this world I'd love than to grow my cute indie business in Nashville. 

Other Ways You Can Help-

  • WAIT... Some people don't have money. Not even $10. And that's ok! You can still help me get the shop ready to open to the public. Do you have gently used or new supplies, furniture, building materials, or well...what do you have? I just may have a use for it. (I'm that girl that steals old windows from the side of the road, I have all kinds of uses for all kinds of things.)
  • Post, retweet, reshare and email it to everyone you know. You can still make a difference. 
  • Or do you have something else that I'm totally missing but you know I'm gonna need it? Give a girl a shout, & I'll give you a listen. 

And that’s all there is to it.

(For those of you that don't 'know' me, I am literally the most dedicated person on the planet. A survivor. If I can survive all that I have and still stand up to 'try' things, I can do just about anything.)
The Impact?
Honestly? I'm just a random girl from Nashville that found something she loves to do while chronicling it all on the internet...but I've got 'heart', as they call it. There's nothing else in this world I'd love than to grow my cute indie business in Nashville. 
Other Ways You Can Help-
WAIT... Some people don't have money. Not even $10. And that's ok! You can still help me get the shop ready to open to the public. Do you have gently used or new supplies, furniture, building materials, or well...what do you have? I just may have a use for it. (I'm that girl that steals old windows from the side of the road, I have all kinds of uses for all kinds of things.)

Post, retweet, reshare and email it to everyone you know. You can still make a difference. 
Or do you have something else that I'm totally missing but you know I'm gonna need it? Give a girl a shout, & I'll give you a listen. 

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
SAVE GOAT HILL 

Our Project: 

The 'Save Goat Hill' project is a community effort to save and repair a historic municipal golf course in Oceanside, California. The goal is to keep this amazing and nostalgic piece of land from being developed into concrete parking lots and buildings. We have won over the fight to keep this a green space for recreation, enjoyment, a safe haven for kids, and a place for the community to gather.. and now, the work continues.


Mission + Impact: 

Our mission is to restore and care for one of the last remaining coastal parklands in San Diego county. To renovate, maintain, promote and operate Goat Hill park to serve the community of Oceanside and citizens of North County looking to enjoy golf, recreation, and community activities at an affordable level. 

Goat Hill Park will be the permanent home of the North County Junior Golf Association and Caddie Academy, providing positive leadership and helping to cultivate education and job opportunities for Oceanside's youth. 

We feel a responsibility to the local community and to the game of golf. With a clean conscience, we could not stand by and watch a landmark golf course be destroyed.

 

Back Story: 

With the local community strongly by their side, a group of locals took over the lease July 1, 2014 after battling a billionaire developer in city hall meetings. The golf course property has been severely neglected for the past few years and is in desperate need of repair and renovation. In particular, the original irrigation system from 1952 (it's original open year as a 9 hole course) is still in place and is in very poor condition and very inefficient. Adding fuel to the fire, California is currently experiencing the worst drought in generations. However, we are working with the Oceanside City Water Department to bring reclaimed water to Goat Hill Park by January 1, 2016. In order to use this reclaimed water, our current irrigation needs to be replaced, including our main line. This is a very unexpected, costly project. We are reaching out to the greater golf community around the country and the world, to ask for your help in repairing this historic municipal golf course. Our goal is to remain affordable and accessible for the working class golfer, the junior golfer, and to the entire community as a outdoor mecca of both recreation and socialization.


Funding: 

This funding campaign is directed toward the unanticipated cost of a new mainline that will be able to tie into a reclaimed water source provided by the City of Oceanside. Due to the unprecedented drought situation of California, Goat Hill Park is in need of funding assistance to get through this challenging time. Your contribution will go towards completing the replacement of our faltering mainline. Once completed, we will be an example of water efficiency for the golf world, and a steward of environmental conservation. The cost for the size and scope of this project is estimated at $250K-$400K.

Contribution:

Many of our friends are already in support of our cause, and have purchased the "Save Goat Hill" t-shirt to show it. A few of these include: Bill Murray, Kelly Slater, Adam Scott, and Geoff Ogilvy. Many of these supporters grew up themselves playing and caddying at "muni" golf courses in this country. We have already put an extensive amount of work rehabilitating the course from a ground level within these first 12 months of managing. Blood, sweat, tears, and plenty of love grazes this land each and every day. With your help, we can get there, not just as Goat Hill park, but as a community. 

Please share this with your circle of friends, and support us on social media. We encourage you to contribute, and join us in aiding our mission. We hope you can see the potential in Goat Hill Park and the positive effect it can have on our ever-growing, beach side community. 

With GREAT appreciation... from all of us at Goat Hill Park, we thank you.

...and please come see us when you're in town. 

Contribution Gifts:

Our "perks" are a great way to show your support on a daily basis. From golf gear, to art, we want you to know you're appreciated. 

** Goat Hill Park will contact you shortly via email regarding choosing a shirt size, hat size, and/or color option**

story:
HEY FRIENDS!!!

Vanessa Plant here! I am so excited to invite you into this super fun part of my life! I am working hard to get this salon up and running and I'm so ready to be in there cutting all the hairs!

Hedwig’s will be a local hair salon in Riverwest that provides a place for people to come in order to look and feel better through high quality styling and personal customer care.  

Hedwig's will exist not only as an entity unto itself but it will also strive to create a space that builds community in Riverwest.  Hedwig’s will strive to be a place that both cares for the needs of others and builds bridges between diverse groups in Riverwest.  In addition, Hedwig’s will intentionally pursue other artists in the neighborhood in the hope of placing the work of their craft on display for all to see.  In a time when all of society is becoming more and more polarized, Hedwig’s will make a conscious effort to offer a space that is neutral and accepting.  Hedwig’s will welcome and serve anyone, no matter the gender, age, race, or sexual preference. No guns allowed.

My intention with Hedwig’s Hair Salon is for it to be a crucial establishment in the Riverwest community. I will be offering high quality haircuts at a moderate price in a manner which reflects the ethos of the neighborhood. I have lived in the Riverwest neighborhood for almost 8 years and I’ve been working at an established salon there for 2 ½ years.  At my previous job, I was given the opportunity to move up into a better and higher paid position. But it would have meant working outside of the neighborhood that I love. Riverwest is a great place to start a new business because the people here are excited about locally owned and run establishments that will better the neighborhood. I am looking forward to being a part of that and getting to know my neighbors better by cutting their hair and/or serving alongside of them in different capacities that are trying to better our community.

I hope to not only make Riverwest a more beautiful place by creating and maintaining beautiful haircuts and styles, but by being an active member of the neighborhood by getting involved in the community in various ways, and through various service opportunities.  


I'm in need of a few things still. I still need to purchase some furniture, the product I will be using, a point-of-sales system, towels, and maybe even a washer/dryer. These all need to be purchased as soon as possible in order to start making appointments and start services in the next month or so!

I am also still needing to pay the builders and everyone who has helped reconstruct the space. That was a big (and very expensive) project that needed to be done and they did a beautiful job! You'll be so happy that we put new bathrooms in, I promise.


PLEASE share this with as many people as you can! I'm so thankful for all of your support whether it be monetary, relational, or spiritual. You guys rock. 

Love,
Vanessa

story:
The Mystery Gift System

What if you could give someone a personal gift and you didn't have to leave your computer, or even search multiple websites until you find what you like? 

What if in ten minutes you could pick out a gift for someone, then sit back and relax knowing the wrapping and shipping will be taken care of? 

That is what Gyfstery does! Gyfstery is a mystery gift system that allows you to quickly and effortlessly pick out a gift for someone based on their personality. All you have to do is fill out a survey and we take care of the rest. 

Why would I use this?

Think about all of the times each year where you need to get a gift for someone. There are all sorts of occasions where you need to get someone a gift. From birthdays and holidays, to thank you gifts and those gifts for the times you just want someone to know you care, there are plenty of times we need to pick out gifts. But if you are like many other people, picking out gifts can be a complete hassle. You could always take the easy way out and send a gift certificate or cash, but there is no personal touch to that. So you decide you have to pick out a gift. There are so many factors that go into picking out a gift for someone. We all live super busy lives, and sometimes finding the time to go to the store and find a gift for someone can be difficult. Not only do you have to spend the time going to and from the store, or multiple stores if you can't find what you are looking for, you have to scour the store looking for a gift that the recipient might like. Once you find the gift you want, you have to worry about getting the gift to the recipient. Then you have to get the gift wrapped. Finally you have to go to another store and ship the gift to its final destination. Once it is all done, you have gone to 5 different stores and spent half your day on this gift.  

How does it work?

Gyfstery is a simple process that takes you no more than ten minutes to complete start to finish. How it works is you tell us about the person you want to give a gift to. By using our simple survey, guided by pictures, you build a profile of the person you are giving a gift to by answer simple questions. Once you are done with all the questions, you are done. The survey questions are simple. They look like this:


Once you have completed the survey, your answers are run through our complex algorithm that breaks down your answers to help match the person you told us about to a gift in our inventory. We then take that gift, package it up, and send it on its way to the recipient.

What kind of Gifts could I expect?

Gyfstery takes pride in only sourcing our gifts with people that care about the products they make. We do not look for cheap items that we can buy in bulk. The items we source are of the highest quality and are items we ourselves would be happy to receive. We have traveled across Texas to farmer's markets and trade shows to find people and their products. As we grow we hope to reach further and further until we are finding suppliers from all over the United States. 

Check out some of the pictures from our latest adventure in Canton, TX.





What We Are Going To Do With The Donations

We are hoping to raise $10,000. This will be used in a handful of ways. 

  • Our main goal is to raise enough money to be able to purchase enough inventory so we can grow our gift options
  • Our secondary goal is to upgrade our website to be able to handle and process orders

The Impact

To us, its not just about the gift we are sending. We care about the story behind each of our suppliers. We enjoy getting to know the people who make the items. We love being able to connect their unique items to others. 


This is Bud, he has always been a rock enthusiast and just recently he found a way to create something with them. Now he is turning rocks into oil lamps. 

Or Leon, he and his wife make beautiful wood items based on antiques from the late 1800's. He makes every piece by hand and has been doing so from his Arkansas home for the past 26 years.


This is Kathy, she makes burlap pillow covers. We found her working hard at her sewing machine making a custom pillow case for a couple getting married in March. 


Risks & Challenges

There are risks with any new venture. Our biggest risk right now is finding enough suppliers who are willing to work with us. We do not want to be sending out the same item over and over again. That defeats the purpose. 

Another challenge we face is getting the algorithm right. We do not want to be sending people gifts they don't like because our basic algorithm is not working right. There is an easy fix to this. Feedback, and lots of it. That's why we are launching through Indigogo. We want your feedback and help.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't want to donate, but you still want to help us, share us with your friends. Like us on Facebook and Follow us on Twitter. Help us reach more people through you!
